description: This file defines the 'NeonFunTheme' class, which provides custom theme configurations for a Flutter application. It includes methods for generating light themes, gradient styles, shadows, and shape helpers, primarily used for styling the frontend UI components.

classes.name: NeonFunTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing theme and style configurations, including color schemes, gradients, shadows, and shape helpers for a Flutter UI.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a customized light ThemeData object with predefined colors, text styles, shapes, and component themes based on a specified style guide.

methods.name: playfulHeaderGradient
methods.description: Creates and returns a linear gradient for headers, using the theme's primary and secondary colors with specified transparency.

methods.name: primaryGradient
methods.description: Creates and returns a linear gradient for primary brand accents, blending primary and secondary colors.

methods.name: subtleOverlayGradient
methods.description: Creates a subtle overlay gradient to enhance contrast, blending black and primary colors with transparency.

methods.name: neonGlow
methods.description: Returns a list of BoxShadow objects styled as a neon glow with the specified color and optional blur radius.

methods.name: mediumCardShadow
methods.description: Provides a medium elevation shadow effect for cards, based on the theme's primary color.

methods.name: highCardShadow
methods.description: Provides a high elevation, multi-shadow effect for hero-style cards, combining primary and secondary colors.

methods.name: pillShape
methods.description: Returns a rounded stadium border shape, suitable for pills or chips.

methods.name: hoverTransform
methods.description: Provides a transform matrix for hover effects, slightly translating the element for web/desktop platforms.
